revision.text:
{{WarnDeprecated}} {{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Upper stack thing | class = UpperStackLookOnly | doomednum = 9077 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SkyViewpoint|SkyViewpoint]]→[[Classes:StackPoint|StackPoint]]→UpperStackLookOnly
The upper stack thing is used to make [[stacked sectors]]. It goes into the upper stack sector. It takes one argument, the opacity of sector: 0 is invisible, 255 is fully opaque. It is to be used with a [[Classes:LowerStackLookOnly|LowerStackLookOnly]] with the same TID, and both sectors should have the same shape and size. Thing based sector stacks should no longer be used. A more robust method to define them exists with [[Sector_SetPortal]] ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR UpperStackLookOnly : {{Class|StackPoint}} {}
